typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		statecode as string,
		ntt_activeregister as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_addresswithheld as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_mobiletelephone as string,
		ntt_reference as string,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_telephone as string,
		ntt_lastname as string,
		timezoneruleversionnumber as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_email as string,
		ntt_dateofbirth as string,
		createdby as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_middlename as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_firstname as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsNTTDateOfBirth as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId as string,
		blNTTAddressWithheld as boolean,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
source(output(
		id as string,
		start as string,
		end as string,
		description as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceAgeDOB
SelectDebtor alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowDebtor
sourceAgeDOB derive(intStart = toInteger(start),
		intEnd = toInteger(end)) ~> dcolAgeBand
sourceValidation derive(intAge = toInteger((toDate(tsModifiedOn) - toDate(tsNTTDateOfBirth)) /365.25)) ~> dcolAge
dcolAge, dcolAgeBand lookup(intAge >= intStart
	&& intAge <= intEnd,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'right')~> LookupAgeDOB
LookupAgeDOB select(mapColumn(
		statecode,
		ntt_activeregister,
		statuscode,
		ntt_addresswithheld,
		createdon,
		ntt_reference,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		timezoneruleversionnumber,
		modifiedby,
		createdby,
		owningbusinessunit,
		owninguser,
		intBatchId = sourceValidation@intBatchId,
		partdist = sourceValidation@partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId,
		blNTTAddressWithheld,
		blIsTruncate,
		ageband = description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDebtor
AlterRowDebtor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/debtors/debtor',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkDebtor
